content.question: The repeated installation of Yayoi Kusama’s Narcissus Garden after its initial appearance in 1966 changed the original interpretation of the work by

choices.label: shifting the work’s focus from critiquing to participating in art as a commodity
revealing Kusama’s decision to voluntarily live out her life in a mental hospital
illuminating how the artist transformed modernist aesthetics in her work
making it possible for the work to be recognized as political commentary

content.answer: shifting the work’s focus from critiquing to participating in art as a commodity

topic.text: 4.4: Theories and Interpretations of Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
